snippet.textDisplay:
FOR THOSE THAT DON'T UNDERSTAND SERBIAN,HERE'S THE FIRST PART OF THE SONG REFRASED IN ENGLISH:
"I wish she was here.as i sit alone with saddness,
but all her tracks are lost into sea of madness."

"And every single day her voice i can hear,when every thynder roars,
and then i realise that everything is broken by storms."
Main vers:"pour my ashes where she's walking by,
let her step on me like when i was alive.
let her steps turn out the last dying light,
the wind will blow everything into the night"...
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: Са преводилачке стране: врло добро одрађен превод :)
